snippet: More women than ever before have been nominated to serve on Capitol Hill, with 18 running for the Senate and 163 vying for the House.
abstract: More women than ever before have been nominated to serve on Capitol Hill, with 18 running for the Senate and 163 vying for the House.

headline.main: Women Running for Congress in Record Numbers
headline.print_headline: Demographic Shift: More Women Running for Office
